selections.name: I'lltellyouanytime
selections.reason: Most experienced runner in the field with a solid 2nd at Doomben last start. Race fitness edge over debutants.

selections.name: Sniper Boom
selections.reason: First starter from the Butterworth yard. Trialled well at Doomben. Watch betting.

selections.name: Lonesome Star
selections.reason: Trial winner at Warwick. Looks ready to run a race on debut.

selections.name: Satomi
selections.reason: Ran 3rd in a trial. Draws the inside gate which is an advantage for a 2YO.

danger_horse.name: Sniper Boom
danger_horse.reason: Stable has a decent strike rate with juveniles and the trial was encouraging.

selections.name: Just Precious
selections.reason: Resuming with a strong fresh record (3:1-1-0). Class runner of the field dropping into a suitable grade.

selections.name: Spiethtacular
selections.reason: Consistent form this prep. Gets in light with 121lbs and draws perfectly in barrier 2.

selections.name: Metalcraft
selections.reason: Won well at Ipswich last start. 3YO with upside taking on older horses.

selections.name: Savagery Vibe
selections.reason: Honest performer who rarely runs a bad race. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Spiethtacular
danger_horse.reason: Speedy type who will be hard to catch with the light weight.

selections.name: Noble Conqueror
selections.reason: Racing in peak form with a win and a close 2nd in last two starts. Ideally placed here.

selections.name: Brindavan
selections.reason: Last start winner at this level. Consistent and maps well.

selections.name: Wapiti
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from the Magic Millions Trophy. Proven weight carrier.

selections.name: Cape Crusader
selections.reason: Failed to finish last start but form prior was solid. Can bounce back.

danger_horse.name: Brindavan
danger_horse.reason: Hard to knock a last start winner in the same grade.

selections.name: Victoria Road
selections.reason: Group 1/2 performer dropping into an Open Handicap. Massive class advantage over this field.

selections.name: Redford
selections.reason: Runner-up in Listed company last start. The clear danger if the top weight struggles.

selections.name: Edited By
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd in the Ballina Cup. Place chance.

selections.name: Mickey's Medal
selections.reason: Solid effort in the Magic Millions Cup. Draws the rail.

danger_horse.name: Redford
danger_horse.reason: Fit and racing in great heart. Will make the favorite earn it.

selections.name: Sunrays
selections.reason: Talented filly with 5 wins from 7 starts. Excellent fresh record (3:3-0-0). The one to beat.

selections.name: Blitzburg
selections.reason: Drops in class from the Magic Millions 3YO. Has ability.

selections.name: Earn To Burn
selections.reason: Won well fresh. Has upside but meets a tough rival in Sunrays.

selections.name: Get Ready Lass
selections.reason: Consistent filly but drawn wide. Place preference.

danger_horse.name: Blitzburg
danger_horse.reason: Class runner who will appreciate the drop in grade.

selections.name: Eclair Awesome
selections.reason: Racing well without winning. Strong wet track stats (7:4-1-0) suit the Soft 5.

selections.name: Detrimental
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten last start. Consistent type who is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Headhunter
selections.reason: Last start winner who draws the inside. Must be respected.

selections.name: Rezone
selections.reason: Won well at Sunshine Coast. Up in grade but has momentum.

danger_horse.name: Detrimental
danger_horse.reason: Honest horse who will be running on late.

selections.name: Crash The Party
selections.reason: Ran 4th in the $2M Magic Millions Guineas. Massive drop in class. Should just win.

selections.name: War King
selections.reason: Consistent form in lower grades. Place chance.

selections.name: North Pole
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Forgive last run. Can feature.

selections.name: Valouri
selections.reason: Consistent maiden/class 1 form. Place hope at odds.

selections.name: Battlefield
selections.reason: Drops from Listed/Quality grade. 8th last start but beaten less than 5L. Strong claims here.

selections.name: Atmosphere
selections.reason: Another dropping from Stakes company. Proven performer at this level.

selections.name: Take A Picture
selections.reason: Last start winner. Steps up in grade but is fit and in form.

selections.name: Deep Respect
selections.reason: Not far away last start. Solid each-way hope.

danger_horse.name: Atmosphere
danger_horse.reason: Class horse who will appreciate the easier assignment.

selections.name: Flag Hall
selections.reason: Resuming. Has excellent fresh stats and class on his side.

selections.name: Vodka Martini
selections.reason: Quality sprinter resuming. Loves the soft (9:3-0-1). Big threat.

selections.name: Tiger Tie
selections.reason: Won last start. Light weight and fit.

selections.name: Fleetwood
selections.reason: Better than recent form suggests. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Vodka Martini
danger_horse.reason: Proven weight carrier with a high cruising speed.

selections.name: Sir Carter
selections.reason: Won a Quality race last start. In career best form. Hard to go past.

selections.name: True Amor
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten last start. Consistent and draws well.

selections.name: Flying Destiny
selections.reason: Solid 4th last start. Consistent record at this distance.

selections.name: Press Link
selections.reason: Resuming. Has ability but may need the run.

danger_horse.name: True Amor
danger_horse.reason: Racing consistently and gets weight relief.
